external_games.name: Train Simulator: PRR RF-16 'Sharknose' Loco Add-On

name: Train Simulator 2021: PRR RF-16 'Sharknose' Loco
summary: The distinctive Baldwin RF-16 with 'Sharknose' design comes to Train Simulator 2021, from Digital Train Model. In 1948, Baldwin Locomotive Works began to apply a new 'Sharknose' body style to its cab unit diesel locomotives, partly to differentiate Baldwin locomotives from its competitors.
